titles.title: To include the Territory of American Samoa in the Supplemental Security Income Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Social Security Act to extend the benefits of the Supplemental Security Income Program under title XVI of such Act to American Samoa.
